1 #include "leica_scanstation_utils/ptx_2_pcd.h"
2 
3 
4 void ptx_2_pcd::operator()(const std::string &ptx_fname)
5 {
6  assert(extension(ptx_fname) == ".ptx");
7 
8  std::string pcd_fname = ptx_fname.substr(0, ptx_fname.find(".ptx")) + std::string(".pcd");
9 
10  std::ifstream ptx_file;
11  std::ofstream pcd_file;
12 
13  ptx_file.open(ptx_fname);
14  pcd_file.open(pcd_fname);
15  std::string line;
16 
17  std::getline(ptx_file, line);
18  _cols = atoi(line.c_str());
19 
20  std::getline(ptx_file, line);
21  _rows = atoi(line.c_str());
22 
23  // Mat transf scaner
24  std::getline(ptx_file, line);
25  fillMatrixRow(_scan_tf, parseLine(line), 3);
26  for (int i = 0; i < 3; i++)
27  {
28  std::getline(ptx_file, line);
29  fillMatrixRow(_scan_tf, parseLine(line), i);
30  }
31  // Mat transf puntos
32  for (int i = 0; i < 4; i++)
33  {
34  std::getline(ptx_file, line);
35  fillMatrixRow(_point_tf, parseLine(line), i);
36  }
37 
38  pcd_file << buildHeader();
39  for (; std::getline(ptx_file, line);)
40  {
41  auto data = parseLine(line);
42  pcd_file << processPointLine(data) << "\n";
43  }
44  ptx_file.close();
45  pcd_file.close();
46 }
47 
48 inline
49 std::string ptx_2_pcd::extension(const std::string &fname) noexcept
50 {
51  std::size_t it = fname.rfind(".");
52  return it == std::string::npos ? "" : fname.substr(it);
53 }
54 
55 inline
56 std::vector<float> ptx_2_pcd::parseLine(const std::string &line)
57 {
58  std::size_t pos = line.find(" ");
59  std::size_t prev_pos = 0;
60  std::vector<float> elements;
61  while (pos != std::string::npos)
62  {
63  elements.emplace_back(atof(line.substr(prev_pos, pos).c_str()));
64  prev_pos = pos + 1;
65  pos = line.find(" ", prev_pos);
66  }
67  elements.emplace_back(atof(line.substr(prev_pos).c_str()));
68  return elements;
69 }
70 
71 inline
72 std::string ptx_2_pcd::transformPoint(const Eigen::Vector4f &point)
73 {
74  Eigen::Vector4f tf_point = point.transpose() * _point_tf;
75  std::stringstream o_point;
76  // [x, y, z, 1]
77  for (int i = 0; i < 2; i++)
78  {
79  o_point << *(tf_point.data() + i) << " ";
80  }
81  o_point << *(tf_point.data() + 2);
82  return o_point.str();
83 }
84 
85 template <typename T, int Rows, int Cols>
86 inline void ptx_2_pcd::fillMatrixRow(Eigen::Matrix<T, Rows, Cols> &matrix, const std::vector<T> &data, int row)
87 {
88  assert(matrix.cols() == data.size());
89  for (int i = 0, size = data.size(); i < size; i++)
90  matrix(row, i) = data[i];
91 }
92 
93 inline
94 std::string ptx_2_pcd::processPointLine(const std::vector<float> &line)
95 {
96  auto end = std::next(line.begin(), 3);
97  std::vector<float> v_point(line.begin(), end);
98  v_point.emplace_back(1.0);
99  Eigen::Vector4f point(v_point.data());
100 
101  return transformPoint(point);
102 }
103 
104 inline
105 std::string ptx_2_pcd::buildHeader()
106 {
107  std::stringstream sstream;
108  sstream << "# .PCD v.7 - Point Cloud Data file format\n";
109  sstream << "VERSION .7\n";
110  sstream << "FIELDS x y z\n";
111  sstream << "SIZE 4 4 4\n";
112  sstream << "TYPE F F F\n";
113  sstream << "COUNT 1 1 1\n";
114  sstream << "WIDTH " << _cols << "\n";
115  sstream << "HEIGHT " << _rows << "\n";
116  sstream << "VIEWPOINT " << _scan_tf.row(3) << " 1 0 0 0\n";
117  sstream << "POINTS " << _cols * _rows << "\n";
118  sstream << "DATA ascii\n";
119  return sstream.str();
120 }
